verses.name: Luke 7:23
verses.text: And blessed is he, whosoever shall not be offended in me.

verses.name: Luke 7:24
verses.text: And when the messengers of John were departed, he began to speak unto the people concerning John, What went ye out into the wilderness for to see? A reed shaken with the wind?

verses.name: Luke 7:25
verses.text: But what went ye out for to see? A man clothed in soft raiment? Behold, they which are gorgeously apparelled, and live delicately, are in kings’ courts.

verses.name: Luke 7:26
verses.text: But what went ye out for to see? A prophet? Yea, I say unto you, and much more than a prophet.
